level.heading: Payments not subject to District tax.
level.text: Relocation and housing assistance payments are not income to the recipient for purposes of the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947 (§ 47-1801.01 et seq.).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-86
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3401.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Reenactment of Law 3-86: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3401.01.
